exception.message:
Don't know how to encode addEcoNewsDtoRequest=%7B%22tags%22%3A%5B%22news%22%5D%2C%22text%22%3A%22It%27s%20API444%20so%20healthy%2C%20fun%20and%20cool%20to%20bring%20eco%20habits%20in%20everyday%20life%20%5Cn%22%2C%22title%22%3A%22Be%20eco%21%20Be%20cool%21%5Cn%22%2C%22source%22%3A%22https%3A%2F%2Fita-social-projects.github.io%2FGreenCityClient%2F%23%2Fnews%2F3079%22%2C%22image%22%3Anull%7D as a byte stream.
Please use EncoderConfig (EncoderConfig#encodeContentTypeAs) to specify how to serialize data for this content-type. For example: "given().config(RestAssured.config().encoderConfig(encoderConfig().encodeContentTypeAs("multipart/form-data", ContentType.TEXT))). .."
